subject: Wrestling
Hormones
lead_paragraph: Charges of harassment and possession of human growth hormone have been dropped against Kurt Angle, an Olympic gold medalist who became a professional wrestler. Angle, 40, was arrested last month in the Pittsburgh suburb of McKees Rocks after a call to the police from his ex-girlfriend, who had a protection order against him. The authorities said they found vials of human growth hormone in Angle’s car, but he said he had a prescription.
